channel.title: How to make an area NON safe?
channel.description:
Im wondring if anyone could please post how to make an area non safe!
If you wanna make the code for me i will post it above! //Most of you guys proberly won't make the code for me and i know that// //So please dont post "do you think people wanna make a code for you"//
Here is the coords!
[code] X:3349 Y:3244 to X:3333 Y:3244 X:3349 Y:3258 to X:3333 Y:3258 [/code]
The code should make a rectangel on a way!

item.title: How to make an area NON safe?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“pkerA, post:4, topic:324194”][quote author=issac link=topic=420599.msg3089504#msg3089504 date=1262766147]
well on my server. if its not a safezone. its wild. but u might be able to code somthing like.

public boolean isInWild() {
	return absX >= 3333 && absX <= 3349 && absY >= 3244&& absY <= 3244
	return absX >= 3333 && absX <= 3349 && absY >= 3258&& absY <= 3258

}
[/quote]

Sorry but this doesnt help! I adding it wrong place all the time!

You dont need to answer on this reply! It just using up your time[/quote]

find a method with wildy, or non safe areas then add the coords…

Read full topic

@crimsonbow13 wrote:

Yeah you are right. People probably don’t. I had that problem when I first started as well, try Googling it man. Google works wonders

“How to add safezone into my runescape private server”
(I know you want a “non” safezone, but its not an example.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 06, 2010, 01:40:02 am[/size][hr]But tbh, I would have made the code for you man, but I have to be up in 2 hours for classes.
